constituent: consent, say, words, keitai, mouth, young, flowers, by one’s side, mouth, mouth2
heisigStory: The words of the young do not have legal validity unless backed up by "parental consent."
koohiiStory1: The words of the very young are useless without CONSENT from their elders.
koohiiStory2: Delores might say, "Yes!", but she´s way too young give any legal consent.
myStory: cho phép thực hiện. những lời nói với người trẻ là được phép thực hiện.
